meanings.sent1: The oligarch was one of the few people who controlled the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The oligarch had a lot of power in the small group ruling the country.
meanings.sent3: The oligarch always got to choose the movie for movie night.
meanings.sent4: She was the oligarch of the playground, deciding who could play on the swings.
meanings.sent5: The oligarch's influence over the boardroom was undeniable.

meanings.definition: A person who belongs to a small group of people who govern or control a country, business, etc.
meanings.sent1: As an oligarch, he had a say in all the important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The oligarch was part of the elite group that managed the company.
meanings.sent3: The oligarch was the only one allowed to bring snacks to the meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was the oligarch of the kitchen, organizing all the cooking schedules.
meanings.sent5: The oligarch's presence in the negotiations was crucial for reaching an agreement.
